nchelper
  • Reference
  • News

Tbl

See dplyr::tbl for details.

See dplyr::collect for details.

# S3 method for src_nc
tbl(src, variable, ...)

# S3 method for tbl_ncdb
collect(x, ..., n = Inf)

Examples

f <- system.file("extdata", "S2008001.L3m_DAY_CHL_chlor_a_9km.nc", package = "ncmeta")
src_nc(f) %>% tbl("lat")
#> # A tibble: ?? x 1
#>      lat
#>    <dbl>
#>  1  90.0
#>  2  89.9
#>  3  89.8
#>  4  89.7
#>  5  89.6
#>  6  89.5
#>  7  89.5
#>  8  89.4
#>  9  89.3
#> 10  89.2
#> # ... with more rows
src_nc(f) %>% tbl("palette")
#> # A tibble: ?? x 1
#>    palette
#>      <dbl>
#>  1    147.
#>  2      0.
#>  3    108.
#>  4    144.
#>  5      0.
#>  6    111.
#>  7    141.
#>  8      0.
#>  9    114.
#> 10    138.
#> # ... with more rows

f2 <- system.file("extdata", "avhrr-only-v2.20180126.nc", package = "nchelper")
tbl(src_nc(f2), "sst")
#> # A tibble: ?? x 4
#>     anom   err   ice   sst
#>    <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>
#>  1    NA    NA    NA    NA
#>  2    NA    NA    NA    NA
#>  3    NA    NA    NA    NA
#>  4    NA    NA    NA    NA
#>  5    NA    NA    NA    NA
#>  6    NA    NA    NA    NA
#>  7    NA    NA    NA    NA
#>  8    NA    NA    NA    NA
#>  9    NA    NA    NA    NA
#> 10    NA    NA    NA    NA
#> # ... with more rows
tbl(src_nc(f2), "zlev")
#> # A tibble: ?? x 1
#>    zlev
#>   <dbl>
#> 1    0.
tbl(src_nc(f2), "time")
#> # A tibble: ?? x 1
#>     time
#>    <dbl>
#> 1 14635.
tbl(src_nc(f2), "lat")
#> # A tibble: ?? x 1
#>      lat
#>    <dbl>
#>  1 -89.9
#>  2 -89.6
#>  3 -89.4
#>  4 -89.1
#>  5 -88.9
#>  6 -88.6
#>  7 -88.4
#>  8 -88.1
#>  9 -87.9
#> 10 -87.6
#> # ... with more rows
tbl(src_nc(f2), "lon")
#> # A tibble: ?? x 1
#>      lon
#>    <dbl>
#>  1 0.125
#>  2 0.375
#>  3 0.625
#>  4 0.875
#>  5 1.12 
#>  6 1.38 
#>  7 1.62 
#>  8 1.88 
#>  9 2.12 
#> 10 2.38 
#> # ... with more rows
